job_purpose: To contribute to real product improvements, learn fast in a supportive environment, and make a real impact by developing features for an online education platform.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Building and refining features in the custom LMS
Developing dashboards, integrations, and internal tools
Collaborating with CEO, developers, and product users to prioritize improvements
Making a real impact with code used by real students weekly
required_qualifications: Ability to work with front-end and back-end code
Desire to grow into a bigger role over time
Understanding of AI integration in daily workflow
preferred_qualifications: Familiarity with Express and REST APIs
Proficiency in using GitHub and Trello
company_details: Key Institute is revolutionizing online education by providing practical support, real student outcomes, and smart digital systems to help Australians gain meaningful qualifications and skills for personal advancement.
